annotations.description: This Chartreuse-infused drink, named for Brooklyn’s Greenpoint neighborhood, is a relative of the 1909 classic, the Brooklyn. It may indeed have a sligh
annotations.title: The Greenpoint - PUNCH

textContent:
2 ounces rye whiskey
.5 ounce sweet vermouth
.5 ounce yellow Chartreuse
1 dash Angostura bitters
1 dash orange bitters
lemon twist

Stir and strain into coupe
Garnish with lemon twist

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/greenpoint/
title: The Greenpoint
